description:
Loads data from a Google Spreadsheet.
Private sheets should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com`.

input.name: url
input.description:
A valid URL of a Google Spreadsheet.
Private sheets should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com`.

input.name: sheetname
input.description:
The title of Sheet to which the data will be written.
If unspecified, `sheet` defaults to the first sheet in the spreadsheet.

input.name: range
input.description:
A valid sheet range which contains data.
If unspecified, the whole sheet will be included.

input.name: skip
input.description:
A list of row indices to be ignored.
If unspecified, the all rows in the range will be included.

input.name: cache
input.description: Specifies for how long (in hours) to cache the results. Defaults to `0` (do not cache).

output.name: data
output.description: The data loaded from the specified Google Spreadsheet.
